thread.title: Ohio teen crushed to death by van seat

title: Ohio teen crushed to death by van seat
text:
Ohio teen crushed to death by van seat 8:53am EDT - 01:06 
Police in Cincinnati, Ohio are investigating the death of a 16-year-old boy who was crushed to death by the seat of his minivan while pleading for help from 911 operators. Diane Hodges reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Police in Cincinnati, Ohio are investigating the death of a 16-year-old boy who was crushed to death by the seat of his minivan while pleading for help from 911 operators. Diane Hodges reports.
